# id: KeytabOverlay -> Builder -> public Builder fromEnvironment(Configuration globalConfiguration)
commentText: Configures the overlay using the current environment (and global configuration).__The following Flink configuration settings are checked for a keytab:_- security.keytab
codeText: public Builder fromEnvironment(Configuration globalConfiguration) {_			String keytab = globalConfiguration.getString(ConfigConstants.SECURITY_KEYTAB_KEY, null)__			if(keytab != null) {_				keytabPath = new File(keytab)__				if(!keytabPath.exists()) {_					throw new IllegalStateException("Invalid configuration for " +_						ConfigConstants.SECURITY_KEYTAB_KEY +_						"_ '" + keytab + "' not found.")__				}_			}__			return this__		}
